definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

pinyin: Yin4 du4 hang2 kong1 gong1 si1

definition: Indochina (old term, esp. colonial period)/now written 中南半島|中南半岛[Zhong1 nan2 Ban4 dao3]
pinyin: Yin4 du4 zhi1 na4 Ban4 dao3
Yin4 du4 ni2 xi1 ya4 yu3

sentences.english: The previous record was held by an Indian man who delivered a 120-hour speech.
sentences.chinese: 此前的纪录为120小时，由一个印度人创造。

sentences.english: Unlike lions or cheetahs, leopards are secretive, solitary cats.
sentences.chinese: 花豹不像狮子或印度豹，是属于较神秘而隐居的大猫。

sentences.english: Ever since she was six years old, Loryn has yearned to visit India.
sentences.chinese: 从六岁开始，洛恩就向往游览印度。

sentences.english: Many of the Parsee merchants have made great fortunes there by dealing in cotton;
sentences.chinese: 很多帕西商人在印度作棉花生意发了大财。

sentences.english: First of all, one should use Indian or Ceylonese tea.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你得用印度或者斯里兰卡茶。

sentences.english: The Indians know full well that China expects obedience from its neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 印度人清楚地知道，中国希望其邻国乖乖地服从领导。

sentences.english: Thanks to demonization of Hinduism by British lootersand their evangelists.
sentences.chinese: 感谢英国掠夺者及其布道者对印度教的妖魔化。

sentences.english: Indian soldiers at the Buddhist monastery in Tawang, India, in June.
sentences.chinese: 6月的达旺，印度士兵在一所佛教寺院中。

sentences.english: The 1961 law forbidding dowries further undermined traditional Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 1961年，法律更进一步地破坏印度教传统的嫁妆。

sentences.english: One on offer . In India the poor, proportionately, are more likely to vote.
sentences.chinese: 按比例来说，印度的穷人比中产阶级更乐于参加投票。

sentences.english: But now it seems Indians, too, are getting less worked up about dalliances.
sentences.chinese: 如今似乎印度人也对放荡不那么激动了。

sentences.english: India's culture is marked by a high degree of syncretism and pluralism.
sentences.chinese: 印度文化以高度的融合性和多元性而著称。

sentences.english: The first Sudirman Cup competition was held in indonesia in 1989 .
sentences.chinese: 第一苏迪曼杯赛正在印度僧西亚于1989年进行。

sentences.english: A contract laborer works in Vishakapatnam, India.
sentences.chinese: 在印度维沙卡帕特南工作的一名合同工。

sentences.english: This concept is one of the fundamental doctrines in Buddhism and Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 这一概念是佛教和印度教最基本的教义之一。

sentences.english: The mangosteen fruit has a long history of medicinal use in Chinese and Ayurvedic medicine.
sentences.chinese: 山竹果在中医和印度草药医学里的药用历史悠久。

definition: Modi (name)/Narendra Modi (1950-), Indian BJP (Bharatiya Janata Party or Indian People's Party) politician, Gujarat Chief Minister from 2001, PM from 2014
Indonesia (abbr. for 印度尼西亞|印度尼西亚)
